data.actual_result: It replaces it with tagging a role (if a role is the same name), or the user's name and discrim.
data.expected_result: Either it removed the UUID after the user's name, or keeps the tag.
data.short_description: When tagging a user who is not in a server with ID's, editing the message removes the tag.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a server without the user in it. - Tag the user in that server using ID's. - Edit the message.
